awd_titl_txt: The Gender Agenda:  Social Movements and Political          Strategies
awd_abstract_narration: This research activity is supported under the Research Opportunities            for Women - - Planning Grant Program.  This award will allow the                principal investigator to begin to assess the legislative impact of the         women's movement in the United States.  The investigator will develop a         plan to evaluate whether political process theory is a better framework         for understanding legislative impact than resource mobilization theory.                                                                                         The investigator has a solid background for this type of research and           the issues to be addressed are both timely and important.  There is             good reason to believe that, consistent with the objectives of the              Research Opportunities for Women Program, this award may result in a            successful follow-up proposal.
org_dir_long_name: Directorate for Social, Behavioral and Economic Sciences
org_div_long_name: Division of Social and Economic Sciences
